## Quiz 01 - Pipes and Filters

1\) If the file `numbers.txt` contains the following text:

11

5

15

25

What would be the output of `cat numbers.txt | sort` and what would be the ouptut of `cat numbers.txt | sort -n`?

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

2\) Using the terms `stdin`, `stdout`, `pipe`, and `filter` describe in 1-4 sentences what the Unix shell does when provided `cat numbers.txt | wc > counts.txt`.
